```diff
+ /**
+  * Kanban Board Component
+  * Displays deals in a pipeline with drag &amp; drop support (coming in Phase 2.2)
+  */
+ import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
+ import { useDataProvider, useNotify, useRefresh } from 'react-admin';
+ import {
+   Box,
+   Typography,
+   FormControl,
+   InputLabel,
+   Select,
+   MenuItem,
+   CircularProgress,
+   Alert,
+   Paper,
+ } from '@mui/material';
+ import { PIPELINE_LIST, getPipelineById, getPipelineStages } from '../../constants/pipelines';
+ import KanbanColumn from './KanbanColumn';
+ 
+ const KanbanBoard = () =&gt; {
+   const [selectedPipeline, setSelectedPipeline] = useState('research-lab');
+   const [deals, setDeals] = useState([]);
+   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
+   const [error, setError] = useState(null);
+   
+   const dataProvider = useDataProvider();
+   const notify = useNotify();
+   const refresh = useRefresh();
+ 
+   // Get pipeline configuration
+   const pipeline = getPipelineById(selectedPipeline);
+   const stages = getPipelineStages(selectedPipeline);
+ 
+   // Load deals for selected pipeline
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     const loadDeals = async () =&gt; {
+       setLoading(true);
+       setError(null);
+       
+       try {
+         const { data } = await dataProvider.getList('deals', {
+           pagination: { page: 1, perPage: 1000 },
+           sort: { field: 'created_at', order: 'DESC' },
+           filter: { pipeline_id: selectedPipeline },
+         });
+         
+         setDeals(data || []);
+       } catch (err) {
+         console.error('Failed to load deals:', err);
+         setError(err.message || 'Failed to load deals');
+         notify('Failed to load deals', { type: 'error' });
+       } finally {
+         setLoading(false);
+       }
+     };
+ 
+     if (selectedPipeline) {
+       loadDeals();
+     }
+   }, [selectedPipeline, dataProvider, notify]);
+ 
+   // Group deals by stage
+   const dealsByStage = stages.reduce((acc, stage) =&gt; {
+     acc[stage.id] = deals.filter(deal =&gt; deal.stage === stage.id);
+     return acc;
+   }, {});
+ 
+   const handlePipelineChange = (event) =&gt; {
+     setSelectedPipeline(event.target.value);
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Box sx={{ width: '100%', height: 'calc(100vh - 200px)' }}&gt;
+       {/* Pipeline Selection */}
+       &lt;Paper sx={{ p: 2, mb: 2 }}&gt;
+         &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' }}&gt;
+           &lt;Box&gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="h5" sx={{ fontWeight: 600, mb: 0.5 }}&gt;
+               {pipeline?.name || 'Sales Pipeline'}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+               {pipeline?.description}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+           
+           &lt;FormControl sx={{ minWidth: 250 }}&gt;
+             &lt;InputLabel id="pipeline-select-label"&gt;Pipeline&lt;/InputLabel&gt;
+             &lt;Select
+               labelId="pipeline-select-label"
+               id="pipeline-select"
+               value={selectedPipeline}
+               label="Pipeline"
+               onChange={handlePipelineChange}
+             &gt;
+               {PIPELINE_LIST.map((p) =&gt; (
+                 &lt;MenuItem key={p.id} value={p.id}&gt;
+                   {p.name}
+                 &lt;/MenuItem&gt;
+               ))}
+             &lt;/Select&gt;
+           &lt;/FormControl&gt;
+         &lt;/Box&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Pipeline Metadata */}
+         {pipeline &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 3, mt: 2 }}&gt;
+             &lt;Box&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+                 Order Size
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="body2" fontWeight={500}&gt;
+                 {pipeline.orderSize}
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;/Box&gt;
+             &lt;Box&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+                 Sales Cycle
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="body2" fontWeight={500}&gt;
+                 {pipeline.salesCycle}
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;/Box&gt;
+             &lt;Box&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+                 Price Range
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="body2" fontWeight={500}&gt;
+                 {pipeline.priceRange}
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;/Box&gt;
+             &lt;Box&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+                 Total Deals
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="body2" fontWeight={500}&gt;
+                 {deals.length}
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;/Box&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+       &lt;/Paper&gt;
+ 
+       {/* Error Display */}
+       {error &amp;&amp; (
+         &lt;Alert severity="error" sx={{ mb: 2 }}&gt;
+           {error}
+         &lt;/Alert&gt;
+       )}
+ 
+       {/* Loading State */}
+       {loading ? (
+         &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: 400 }}&gt;
+           &lt;CircularProgress /&gt;
+         &lt;/Box&gt;
+       ) : (
+         /* Kanban Board */
+         &lt;Box
+           sx={{
+             display: 'flex',
+             gap: 2,
+             overflowX: 'auto',
+             overflowY: 'hidden',
+             height: 'calc(100% - 140px)',
+             pb: 2,
+             px: 1,
+             '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar': {
+               height: 8,
+             },
+             '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar-track': {
+               bgcolor: 'background.default',
+               borderRadius: 1,
+             },
+             '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb': {
+               bgcolor: 'divider',
+               borderRadius: 1,
+               '&amp;:hover': {
+                 bgcolor: 'text.secondary',
+               },
+             },
+           }}
+         &gt;
+           {stages.map((stage) =&gt; (
+             &lt;KanbanColumn
+               key={stage.id}
+               stage={stage}
+               deals={dealsByStage[stage.id] || []}
+               pipelineId={selectedPipeline}
+             /&gt;
+           ))}
+           
+           {stages.length === 0 &amp;&amp; (
+             &lt;Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 6, width: '100%' }}&gt;
+               &lt;Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+                 No stages defined for this pipeline
+               &lt;/Typography&gt;
+             &lt;/Box&gt;
+           )}
+         &lt;/Box&gt;
+       )}
+     &lt;/Box&gt;
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default KanbanBoard;
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
+ /**
+  * Kanban Column Component
+  * Represents a single stage in the pipeline
+  */
+ import { Box, Typography, Paper, alpha } from '@mui/material';
+ import DealCard from './DealCard';
+ 
+ const KanbanColumn = ({ stage, deals, pipelineId }) =&gt; {
+   // Calculate total value of deals in this stage
+   const totalValue = deals.reduce((sum, deal) =&gt; {
+     return sum + (deal.value || 0);
+   }, 0);
+ 
+   // Stage color mapping
+   const stageColors = {
+     awareness: '#64748B',
+     interest: '#F59E0B',
+     consideration: '#4A90A4',
+     decision: '#6C5CE7',
+     purchase: '#17A2B8',
+     qualification: '#F59E0B',
+     discovery: '#4A90A4',
+     technical_validation: '#6C5CE7',
+     commercial_negotiation: '#8B5CF6',
+     contract_sent: '#10B981',
+     partnership_discussion: '#F59E0B',
+     due_diligence: '#4A90A4',
+     pilot_partnership: '#6C5CE7',
+     contract_negotiation: '#8B5CF6',
+     won: '#28A745',
+     lost: '#DC3545',
+   };
+ 
+   const stageColor = stageColors[stage.id] || '#64748B';
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Paper
+       elevation={0}
+       sx={{
+         minWidth: 340,
+         maxWidth: 340,
+         bgcolor: 'background.paper',
+         border: '1px solid',
+         borderColor: 'divider',
+         borderRadius: 2,
+         display: 'flex',
+         flexDirection: 'column',
+         height: '100%',
+         transition: 'box-shadow 0.2s',
+         '&amp;:hover': {
+           boxShadow: 2,
+         },
+       }}
+     &gt;
+       {/* Stage Header */}
+       &lt;Box
+         sx={{
+           p: 2,
+           borderBottom: '2px solid',
+           borderColor: stageColor,
+           bgcolor: alpha(stageColor, 0.05),
+         }}
+       &gt;
+         &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' }}&gt;
+           &lt;Typography
+             variant="subtitle1"
+             fontWeight={600}
+             sx={{
+               color: stageColor,
+               textTransform: 'uppercase',
+               fontSize: '0.875rem',
+               letterSpacing: 0.5,
+             }}
+           &gt;
+             {stage.name}
+           &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;Box
+             sx={{
+               bgcolor: stageColor,
+               color: 'white',
+               px: 1,
+               py: 0.25,
+               borderRadius: 1,
+               fontSize: '0.75rem',
+               fontWeight: 600,
+             }}
+           &gt;
+             {deals.length}
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         &lt;/Box&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Stage Metrics */}
+         &lt;Box sx={{ mt: 1 }}&gt;
+           &lt;Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={700} color="primary.main"&gt;
+             â‚¬{totalValue.toLocaleString('de-DE')}
+           &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+             Total Value
+           &lt;/Typography&gt;
+         &lt;/Box&gt;
+       &lt;/Box&gt;
+ 
+       {/* Deals List */}
+       &lt;Box
+         sx={{
+           p: 1.5,
+           overflowY: 'auto',
+           flex: 1,
+           '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar': {
+             width: 6,
+           },
+           '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar-track': {
+             bgcolor: 'background.default',
+             borderRadius: 1,
+           },
+           '&amp;::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb': {
+             bgcolor: 'divider',
+             borderRadius: 1,
+             '&amp;:hover': {
+               bgcolor: 'text.secondary',
+             },
+           },
+         }}
+       &gt;
+         {deals.length &gt; 0 ? (
+           deals.map((deal) =&gt; (
+             &lt;DealCard
+               key={deal.id}
+               deal={deal}
+               stageColor={stageColor}
+             /&gt;
+           ))
+         ) : (
+           &lt;Box
+             sx={{
+               textAlign: 'center',
+               py: 4,
+               px: 2,
+               border: '2px dashed',
+               borderColor: 'divider',
+               borderRadius: 2,
+               bgcolor: 'background.default',
+             }}
+           &gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+               No deals in this stage
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+       &lt;/Box&gt;
+     &lt;/Paper&gt;
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default KanbanColumn;
+ 
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * Deal Card Component
+  * Individual deal card in Kanban board
+  * Drag &amp; Drop will be added in Phase 2.2
+  */
+ import {
+   Card,
+   CardContent,
+   Typography,
+   Box,
+   Chip,
+   Avatar,
+   Tooltip,
+ } from '@mui/material';
+ import {
+   CalendarToday as CalendarIcon,
+   Email as EmailIcon,
+   Person as PersonIcon,
+ } from '@mui/icons-material';
+ import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
+ 
+ const DealCard = ({ deal, stageColor }) =&gt; {
+   const navigate = useNavigate();
+ 
+   const handleClick = () =&gt; {
+     navigate(&#96;/deals/${deal.id}/show&#96;);
+   };
+ 
+   // Format date
+   const formatDate = (dateString) =&gt; {
+     if (!dateString) return null;
+     try {
+       return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('de-DE', {
+         day: '2-digit',
+         month: 'short',
+         year: 'numeric',
+       });
+     } catch {
+       return null;
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Get initials from name
+   const getInitials = (name) =&gt; {
+     if (!name) return '?';
+     return name
+       .split(' ')
+       .map((n) =&gt; n[0])
+       .join('')
+       .toUpperCase()
+       .slice(0, 2);
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Card
+       onClick={handleClick}
+       sx={{
+         mb: 1.5,
+         cursor: 'pointer',
+         transition: 'all 0.2s',
+         '&amp;:hover': {
+           boxShadow: 4,
+           transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
+         },
+         '&amp;:active': {
+           transform: 'translateY(0)',
+         },
+       }}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;CardContent sx={{ p: 2, '&amp;:last-child': { pb: 2 } }}&gt;
+         {/* Deal Title */}
+         &lt;Typography
+           variant="subtitle2"
+           fontWeight={600}
+           gutterBottom
+           sx={{
+             overflow: 'hidden',
+             textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
+             display: '-webkit-box',
+             WebkitLineClamp: 2,
+             WebkitBoxOrient: 'vertical',
+             minHeight: '2.5em',
+             mb: 1,
+           }}
+         &gt;
+           {deal.title || deal.name || 'Untitled Deal'}
+         &lt;/Typography&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Lead/Contact Info */}
+         {(deal.lead_email || deal.contact_email) &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.5, mb: 1 }}&gt;
+             &lt;EmailIcon sx={{ fontSize: 14, color: 'text.secondary' }} /&gt;
+             &lt;Typography
+               variant="caption"
+               color="text.secondary"
+               sx={{
+                 overflow: 'hidden',
+                 textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
+                 whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
+               }}
+             &gt;
+               {deal.lead_email || deal.contact_email}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Contact Name */}
+         {deal.contact_name &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.5, mb: 1 }}&gt;
+             &lt;PersonIcon sx={{ fontSize: 14, color: 'text.secondary' }} /&gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+               {deal.contact_name}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Deal Value */}
+         {deal.value &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ mt: 1.5, mb: 1 }}&gt;
+             &lt;Chip
+               label={&#96;â‚¬${deal.value.toLocaleString('de-DE')}&#96;}
+               size="small"
+               color="primary"
+               sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}
+             /&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Expected Close Date */}
+         {deal.expected_close &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.5, mt: 1 }}&gt;
+             &lt;CalendarIcon sx={{ fontSize: 14, color: 'text.secondary' }} /&gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary"&gt;
+               Expected: {formatDate(deal.expected_close)}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Assigned To */}
+         {deal.assigned_to_name &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.75, mt: 1.5 }}&gt;
+             &lt;Avatar
+               sx={{
+                 width: 24,
+                 height: 24,
+                 fontSize: '0.7rem',
+                 bgcolor: stageColor,
+               }}
+             &gt;
+               {getInitials(deal.assigned_to_name)}
+             &lt;/Avatar&gt;
+             &lt;Typography variant="caption" fontWeight={500}&gt;
+               {deal.assigned_to_name}
+             &lt;/Typography&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Deal Score (if available) */}
+         {deal.score !== undefined &amp;&amp; deal.score !== null &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;Box sx={{ mt: 1 }}&gt;
+             &lt;Tooltip title="Lead Score"&gt;
+               &lt;Chip
+                 label={&#96;Score: ${deal.score}&#96;}
+                 size="small"
+                 variant="outlined"
+                 sx={{ fontSize: '0.7rem' }}
+               /&gt;
+             &lt;/Tooltip&gt;
+           &lt;/Box&gt;
+         )}
+       &lt;/CardContent&gt;
+     &lt;/Card&gt;
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default DealCard;
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
+ /**
+  * Kanban Components Export
+  */
```

Ausgezeichnet! Ich habe die Kanban Board Grundstruktur erfolgreich implementiert. Hier ist eine Zusammenfassung der Ã„nderungen:

## âœ… Implementiert

### 1. **KanbanBoard.jsx** - Hauptkomponente
- âœ… Pipeline Selection Dropdown mit allen drei Pipelines (Research Lab, B2B Lab, Panel Co-Creation)
- âœ… Pipeline-Metadaten (Order Size, Sales Cycle, Price Range, Total Deals)
- âœ… Automatisches Laden der Deals Ã¼ber das Backend API (`GET /api/v1/deals`)
- âœ… Gruppierung der Deals nach Stage
- âœ… Horizontales Scrolling fÃ¼r viele Stages
- âœ… Loading und Error States

### 2. **KanbanColumn.jsx** - Stage Spalten
- âœ… Stage Header mit Namen und Deal Count
- âœ… Farbkodierung fÃ¼r verschiedene Stages
- âœ… Total Value Berechnung pro Stage (in Euro)
- âœ… Scrollbare Deal-Liste pro Spalte
- âœ… Empty State fÃ¼r Stages ohne Deals

### 3. **DealCard.jsx** - Deal Karten
- âœ… Deal Titel mit Ellipsis bei langen Namen
- âœ… Lead/Contact Email und Name
- âœ… Deal Value als Chip
- âœ… Expected Close Date mit deutschem Format
- âœ… Assigned To mit Avatar und Initialen
- âœ… Lead Score Badge (wenn vorhanden)
- âœ… Click-Handler fÃ¼r Navigation zu Deal Details
- âœ… Hover-Effekt

### 4. **DealList.jsx** - Integration
- âœ… Import des KanbanBoard
- âœ… Ersetzung des Placeholders
- âœ… View-Toggle zwischen List und Kanban funktioniert

## ðŸ“‹ Features

- **Pipeline Wechsel**: Dropdown zum AuswÃ¤hlen der Pipeline
- **Stage Columns**: Horizontale Spalten fÃ¼r alle Pipeline-Stages
- **Deal Count & Value**: Anzeige pro Stage
- **Responsive Design**: Horizontales Scrolling bei vielen Stages
- **Performance**: LÃ¤dt bis zu 1000 Deals pro Pipeline
- **Deutsche Lokalisierung**: Datumsformat und WÃ¤hrung
